description: A retrieval-augmented movie recommendation agent that uses LlamaIndex to combine user preferences with a movie knowledge base (plots, genres, cast, reviews) to produce personalized recommendations and explanations. It supports filtering, ranking, and returning relevant metadata and rationale for each suggestion.

input_descriptions.user_query: Free-text description of what the user wants (mood, example movies, themes, or specific request).
input_descriptions.preferred_actors_directors: List of actors or directors the user likes (e.g., ["Scarlett Johansson", "Christopher Nolan"]).
input_descriptions.release_year_range: Object with 'from' and 'to' years to constrain release date (e.g., {"from":2000, "to":2020}).
input_descriptions.max_results: Maximum number of recommendations to return.
input_descriptions.include_synopses: Whether to include short plot synopses for each recommended movie.
input_descriptions.explain_reasons: Whether to include brief rationale explaining why each movie was recommended.
